column5: Private suite on a quiet tree lined street. Includes kitchenette, 2 bdrms, & 1 bath. The kitchenette has a mini fridge, microwave, toaster over, electric kettle, cooktop, tea and coffee. It is part of our home, but private with a separate entrance.  We are 3 blocks from the bus route to downtown. Complementary shuttle from and to the Austin airport.  Access to washer and dryer upon request. Licensed by city. City hotel tax included in price. State hotel tax added and collected by Airbnb.
